## Softwares installation

- `Plink` 
- `vcftools`
- `BCFtools` 
- `Bedtools`

::: {.callout-tip title="Softwares installation" collapse="true"}

1. go to *terminal* from your `mac` or `windows` PC (see pre-course if cant open)

2. make directory & Download software files in there
```bash
cd --

mkdir -p ~/tools/plink 

cd ~/tools/plink

# get the plink with wget command

wget https://s3.amazonaws.com/plink1-assets/plink_linux_x86_64_20250819.zip
```

3. unzip files
```bash
unzip plink_linux_x86_64_20250819.zip
```
4. change permission
```bash
ll
chmod +x plink
ll
```
5. activate plink
```bash
echo 'export PATH=$PATH:~/tools/plink' >> ~/.bashrc

source ~/.bashrc
echo 'export PATH=$PATH:~/tools/plink' >> ~/.bashrc
source ~/.bashrc
```

6. check plink activation
```bash
plink --version

# or 

plink
```
## Install vcftools, bcftools, bedtools
first see them if they are installed already or not
```bash
vcftools --version
bcftools --version
bedtools --version
```
If you see error or there is not tools like that then follow the rest command and execute one by one

```bash
sudo apt install vcftools

vcftools --version
```

```bash
sudo apt install bcftools

bcftools --version
```

```bash
sudo apt install bedtools

bedtools --version
```

:::
